description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively design and manage the country programme and its components., which contributes to Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Sri Lanka Country Programme is effectively and efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children.

title.narrative: Sri Lanka Country Programme Action Plan
Sri Lanka Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Overview)
Sri Lanka Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Programme Effectiveness)
UNICEF Programmes in Sri Lanka (Emergency Response)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2018 Sri Lanka: Evaluation of the European Union Support to District Development Programme (EU-SDDP) Sri Lanka
2019 Sri Lanka: Evaluability assessment of the UNICEF Sri Lanka Country Programme
Sri Lanka 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively design and manage the country programme and its components.

description.narrative: Country programme priorities effectively coordinated to deliver results during a challenging year resulting from the Easter Sunday bombings in April and changes in senior management. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Time taken to disburse Direct Cash Transfers through National Treasury to Government partners
